overview: This video was made to talk about abuse in psychiatry, which I experienced in Montreal. However I chose to let others words explain my feelings on the topic. The visuals are recontextualized shots from The Miracle Worker, starring Patty Duke as Helen Keller. Patty Duke went on to develop bipolar disorder, like me.  The main sound used in this video is from the radio emissions captured by the Cassini space probe from Saturn.
title: Madness in Four Actions
